title: Discovery
description: Jersey wasn't prepared for what awaited her in that bar or who...  In a matter of moments my life changed and everything I thought I knew about myself was wrong. How could I get to be 36 years old and never realize what I truly am? How am I going to navigate two gorgeous men each with their own agendas and still figure out where my place is in this world?  All I do know is that I will F*** it up somehow because that is what I do...  AUTHORS The Jersey Banks series will be 3 books and they all contain violence, mature sexual situations and language.
author: Jennifer Russell
